00038 
00039 
00040 #include "ConditionDSDuration.hpp"
00041 
00042 namespace RTT {
00043     using namespace detail;
00044 
00045     ConditionDSDuration::ConditionDSDuration( DataSource<double>::shared_ptr ds, bool invert )
00046         : time( ds ), hb( TimeService::Instance() ),
00047           mark( 0 ), _invert( invert )
00048     {}
00049 
00050     ConditionDSDuration::~ConditionDSDuration()
00051     {}
00052 
00053     bool ConditionDSDuration::evaluate()
00054     {
00055         return _invert != ( time->get() > hb->secondsSince( mark ) );
00056     }
00057 
00058     void ConditionDSDuration::reset()
00059     {
00060         mark = hb->getTicks();
00061     }
00062 
00063     ConditionInterface* ConditionDSDuration::clone() const
00064     {
00065         return new ConditionDSDuration( time, _invert );
00066     }
00067 
00068     ConditionInterface* ConditionDSDuration::copy( std::map<const DataSourceBase*, DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const
00069     {
00070         return new ConditionDSDuration( time->copy(alreadyCloned), _invert );
00071     }
00072 }
